Title: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask
Writer: David Reuben (from the book "Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex * But Were Afraid to Ask" by), Woody Allen (written for the screen by)
Actors: Woody Allen, John Carradine, Lou Jacobi, Louise Lasser
Plot: Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.
